segments.text: Good morning Mr Smith . My name is Susan and I am a reporter for the Evening Star .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping to talk to you today about your business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you been the owner of your computer shop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how many staff do you employ ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is my wife who does the accounts and my brother who helps with the sales .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So this is a family business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are a small family business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how many computers do you sell each day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That depends on the day . We sell from here and on the Internet . I would say about twenty to thirty per week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That about one hundred a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you B for your time .
segments.speaker: S1
